HediffDef.label: compounding aluminum
HediffDef.description: Rapidly stores identity by burning an aluminum metalmind.

HediffDef.label: storing aluminum
HediffDef.description: This pawn is storing nutrition in a aluminum metalmind. Their metabolism speeds up dramatically, burning through food reserves at an accelerated rate. They become hungry faster and must eat more to maintain energy — but the nutrition is preserved for future emergencies.

HediffDef.label: tapping aluminum
HediffDef.description: This pawn is tapping an aluminum metalmind, solidifying their Identity. Their investiture is tightly bound to them, resisting foreign influence and making keyed metalminds nearly impossible to access by others.
